response.original_title: Mark Rothstein's World of Rope Jumping
response.overview: Mark is accompanied by five dynamic rope jumpers from the BOHOPPERS precision jump rope team, based in Florida.  Mark's lead and Bo Bohannon's direction (33 years of teaching experience), make the 40 skills detailed and easy to follow.  In 1996, this video was selected by the American Heart Association as its exclusive educational video for the 1996-1997 Jump Rope for Heart National Program.  Mark recommends this Original Instructional video as a prerequisite for Videos 2, 3 & 4 in his series.  Please contact Mark for information on his World Tour, professional jump ropes, and other videos in his series available on VHS and DVD.
response.tagline: From Atlanta, Georgia, Mark continues to tour around the world promoting rope jumping and fitness.  In the USA he has driven 1,000,000 miles to perform 7500 shows to 5,000,000 people.  Mark has also established two world records for marathon rope jumping.
response.title: Mark Rothstein's World of Rope Jumping
